name: star-piece
short_effect: Platinum: Trade for one of each color Shard. Black and White: Trade for PP Up. Sell for 4900 Pokédollars, or to Ore Collector for 9800 Pokédollars.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: A shard of a pretty gem that sparkles in a red color. It can be sold at a high price to shops.
flavor_text.platinum: A shard of a pretty gem that sparkles in a red color. It can be sold at a high price to shops.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: A shard of a pretty gem that sparkles in a red color. It can be sold at a high price to shops.
